result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Status conference scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 03:45 pm.

2:44 pm CASES: 22CF321(IA), 22CF139 & 22CF68 (Prelim) Prosecuting attorney Benjamin James Webster in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Danielle L Steffen in court.  Attorney Daniel James Chapman in court for Danielle L Steffen. CH- Clerk 22CF321(IA) - Atty Chapman has been appointed, DE rec'd CC. Waives reading. Atty Chapman - WOPH. Ct. finds DE FVI&K waives PH. CT. Accepts waiver, finds PC and DE is bound over for trial. 
22CF139 & 22CF68 (Prelim)  - State calls Deputy Adam Morine, S&T. CT. Identification made. State requests court take JN bonds in 20CF537, 19CF318, 19CF319, 20CF143. Court takes notice of bond in each case requested by the state. Atty Chapman - cross. CT. venue is established, finds PC, DE bound over for trial. State to file information. Bond cont. 2:56 pm adj.
Arraignment scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 09:45 am.

Not to have contact with co-defendant Nikki Greiner.   No possession of paraphernalia or controlled substances without a prescription and only in amount/frequency as prescribed.  Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.  Not to operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed.

Defendant Danielle L Steffen appeared by video means from the Polk County Jail. Prosecuting Atty Benjamin James Webster appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Donna Burger appears in court. 1:13 p.m. AO-Clerk. De has rec'd CC, waive reading, qualifies.  State requests $1500 cash bond.  Ct sets bond. 1:21 p.m. adj.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 02:00 pm.  Status conference scheduled for April 8, 2022 at 09:30 am.
